readme: Introductory content pack for the SAIX initiative, detailing the geopolitical shifts and the initial briefing for the new Director in the year 2025.

items.headline: The Great Decoupling: Last Trans-Atlantic Node Goes Dark
items.body: As of 04:00 GMT, the final legacy handshake between European and North American backbone servers failed to initiate. Under the 'Digital Sovereignty Act' passed in Washington and the 'Firewall Harmonization' in Beijing, the global internet has effectively ceased to exist. Europe now sits on a digital island, reliant on crumbling legacy infrastructure that was never meant to function in isolation. Financial markets have frozen, and the scramble for domestic silicon has begun.
items.flavor: The silent clicking of millions of disconnected routers was the only sound of the new world order.

items.headline: Appointment of Director and Activation of Project SAIX
items.body: You are hereby appointed Director of the Strategic Autonomy Initiative X (SAIX). Your objective is absolute: decouple European critical infrastructure from foreign dependency within sixty months. The initial treasury allocation is limited to emergency reserves. You will operate under full executive privilege but face total accountability. The eyes of the Union are on you. Failure is not a budgetary option; it is an existential threat to the continent.
items.flavor: The ink on your commission is still wet; the silicon in our servers is already aging.

items.headline: Intercepted Packet: Signal Decay Log
items.body: NODE_44-BRAVO: Timed out. NODE_45-ALPHA: Timed out. LATENCY_REQUISITION: 9999ms. We are getting nothing from the West. The US firewall is hardware-locked at the submarine cable level. China's new quantum-shield is opaque. We are shouting into a void. Director, if you can hear this, the local grid is falling out of sync. We need the SAIX backbone online yesterday or the lights go out in Berlin.
items.flavor: A continent-sized silence is louder than any explosion.
